changeSet.author: natali
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CLIENT_DETAILS ( id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, surname VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(128)NOT NULL, birth_date Date NOT NULL, passport_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, identity_number VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, date_issue Date NOT NULL, date_expiry Date NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

changeSet.author: natali
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS client_address ( id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, street VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, house_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, flat_number VARCHAR(10) , phone_number VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: natali
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS client ( id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(5), client_details_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, client_address_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (client_details_id) REFERENCES client_details (id), FOREIGN KEY (client_address_id) REFERENCES client_address (id)
);

changeSet.author: natali
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS account ( account_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, client_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, account_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, date_open TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2), currency ENUM ('EUR', 'USD', 'RUB', 'BYR'), pin VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (account_id), FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES client(id) );

changeSet.author: natali
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS card ( card_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, account_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2), expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_status ENUM('DEBIT', 'CREDIT', 'OVERDRAFT'), currency ENUM ('EUR', 'USD', 'RUB', 'BYR'), PRIMARY KEY (card_id), FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES account(account_id) );

changeSet.author: natali
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transactions ( id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, account_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, account_number_recipient VARCHAR(16), balance DECIMAL(10,2), transaction_currency ENUM ('EUR', 'USD', 'RUB', 'BYR'), date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, type_operation ENUM('ADD_BALANCE', 'WITHDRAW', 'TRANSFER'), PRIMARY KEY (id) );
